page.title: 10PADSTOW GIRL GUIDES
page.content: Guides start at 7.00 p.m. on Monday nights and finish at 9.00.We have three patrols called Swallow,Chaffinch and Canary.When we arrive at the Guide Hut we walk smartly into a horseshoe and our Guider collects our subs of 20p.Next we go to our Patrol Corner where we have a Patrol Box and a table.In the Box are paper and pencil and Guide Books.We learn about the Guide Laws and Promises (which are hard to obey all the time) and find out what we have to do for our badges. While we are doing this the Patrol Leaders often go out and lay trails for us to follow.Sometimes we play games or have quizzes.At the end of the meetings we sing songs before going home.Guides are 75 years old this year and there is an old lady living in Padstow who was a member of Padstow's first Guide Group.
